scripts.compile: mkdirp ./dist && npm run clean && npm run fetch:all
scripts.i18n:src: mkdirp translations/core && format-message extract --out-file translations/core/en.json src/**.js
scripts.fetch:all: npm run fetch:drivers && npm run fetch:exts && npm run fetch:firmwares && npm run fetch:tools
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dev
scripts.build:dir: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dir
scripts.build:dist: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist
scripts.build:dist32: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist --arch=ia32
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run fetch:all && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist
scripts.dist32: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run fetch:all32 && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist --arch=ia32
scripts.distDev: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run fetch:all && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dev
